episodes.title: NXIVM Sex Cult Exposed! w/ Sarah Edmondson
episodes.description:
On today's episode of Mormon Media Reviews on MBR, Steven and Rebecca have the pleasure of interviewing the wonderful actor and podcaster Sarah Edmondson of  "A Little Bit Culty" podcast and HBO's "The Vow". Sarah is a survivor of the NXVIM cult and  published her story in the best selling book, "Scarred: The True Story of How I Escaped NXIVM, the Cult that Bound My Life" (link to purchase: https://www.sarahedmondson.com/book)  with Kristine Gasbarre. The book tells Sarah's story of spending years in the cult, her fight to escape, and her collaboration with the FBI to help others get out. Sarah’s story is also featured in the CBC podcast “Uncover: Escaping NXIVM” and “The Vow,” a critically acclaimed HBO documentary series. Steve and Rebecca really enjoyed their conversation with Sarah as she shared her life philosophies and strategies for moving forward. We're sure you will too!
